messageBody:
>I'm sorry for what you consider noise. I guess I got involved in the
>discussion, I thought it was (at times) useful. Since it was my first

Never appologise for robust discussion. Nobody called anybody names, everyone was polite.

>-1 -- but hey, I clearly don't fit here. I thought I was discussing

You'll do fine around here. Just remember that no one every gets everything they ask for. I still don't have J.B. convinced that he needs tests for his getters and setters! ;-)

>No more noise from me...

That would be wimping out ... don't you dare!

Simon
